oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The effect of irrigation method on the quality and shelf-life of strawberry fruit in organic production
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Parikka, Päivi
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Organic production of strawberry was investigated at MTT Agrifood Research Finland during 2000-2002. Research topics included irrigation method and its effect on fruit quality.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Parikka, Päivi (2003) The effect of irrigation method on the quality and shelf-life of strawberry fruit in organic production. Paper at: NJF's 22nd congress "Nordic agriculture in global perspective", Turku, Finland, July 1-4, 2003.
